zh-cn: 何塞·普拉西多·多明哥·恩比尔

description.zh-cn: 西班牙歌唱家、指挥家及歌剧院管理者，因其响亮、清晰且强有力的嗓音而闻名，是20世纪后半叶世界三大男高音之一。
description.en: A Spanish singer, conductor, and opera administrator known for his resonant, clear, and powerful voice, he is one of The Three Tenors of the latter half of the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙首都，也是普拉西多·多明哥的出生地。
description.en: The capital city of Spain and the birthplace of Plácido Domingo.

description.zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥的第一任妻子。
description.en: Plácido Domingo's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥的第二任妻子。
description.en: Plácido Domingo's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥的儿子。
description.en: Son of Plácido Domingo.

description.zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥的儿子。
description.en: Son of Plácido Domingo.

description.zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥的儿子。
description.en: Son of Plácido Domingo.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国华盛顿特区的歌剧院，普拉西多·多明哥曾在此担任总监。
description.en: An opera house in Washington, D.C., USA, where Plácido Domingo served as General Director.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国洛杉矶的歌剧公司，普拉西多·多明哥曾在此担任总监。
description.en: An opera company in Los Angeles, USA, where Plácido Domingo served as General Director.

nodes.id: 普拉西多·多明哥性骚扰指控

zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥性骚扰指控

description.zh-cn: 自2019年8月起，多名女性公开指控普拉西多·多明哥对她们进行性骚扰。该事件导致多明哥的多个演出被取消，并最终辞去洛杉矶歌剧院总监职务。2020年2月，多明哥为此道歉并承担全部责任。
description.en: Beginning in August 2019, multiple women publicly accused Plácido Domingo of sexual harassment. The affair led to the cancellation of several of Domingo's performances and his eventual resignation as General Director of the Los Angeles Opera. In February 2020, Domingo apologized and took full responsibility.

description.zh-cn: 2019冠状病毒病在墨西哥的爆发情况，普拉西多·多明哥在此期间被确诊感染。
description.en: The outbreak of COVID-19 in Mexico, during which Plácido Domingo was diagnosed with the virus.

description.zh-cn: 位于墨西哥的国立音乐学院，普拉西多·多明哥曾在此就读。
description.en: A national music conservatory in Mexico, where Plácido Domingo studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于以色列特拉维夫的歌剧公司，普拉西多·多明哥职业生涯早期曾在此演出。
description.en: An opera company in Tel Aviv, Israel, where Plácido Domingo performed early in his career.

description.zh-cn: 1985年9月19日发生在墨西哥城的一场大地震，导致普拉西多·多明哥的多位亲人罹难。
description.en: A major earthquake that struck Mexico City on September 19, 1985, in which several of Plácido Domingo's relatives were killed.

description.zh-cn: 意大利男高音歌唱家，与多明哥、卡雷拉斯并称为世界三大男高音。
description.en: Italian operatic tenor, known as one of The Three Tenors along with Domingo and Carreras.

description.zh-cn: 西班牙男高音歌唱家，与多明哥、帕瓦罗蒂并称为世界三大男高音。
description.en: Spanish operatic tenor, known as one of The Three Tenors along with Domingo and Pavarotti.

description.zh-cn: 由帕瓦罗蒂、多明哥和卡雷拉斯于世界杯期间共同举办的一系列获得巨大成功的演唱会。
description.en: A series of hugely successful concerts given by Luciano Pavarotti, Plácido Domingo, and José Carreras during the FIFA World Cups.

description.zh-cn: 1990年在意大利举办的国际足联世界杯，首场三大男高音演唱会在此期间举行。
description.en: The FIFA World Cup held in Italy in 1990, during which the first Three Tenors concert took place.

nodes.id: 卡雷拉斯国际血癌基金会

zh-cn: 卡雷拉斯国际血癌基金会

description.zh-cn: 由何塞·卡雷拉斯成立的旨在抗击血癌的基金会，首场三大男高音演唱会曾为其筹款。
description.en: A foundation established by José Carreras to fight against leukaemia, which the first Three Tenors concert raised funds for.

description.zh-cn: 中国作曲家、指挥家，创作了歌剧《秦始皇》。
description.en: Chinese composer and conductor who wrote the opera 'The First Emperor'.

description.zh-cn: 由谭盾作曲的歌剧，普拉西多·多明哥在其全球首演中饰演主角秦始皇。
description.en: An opera composed by Tan Dun, in which Plácido Domingo starred as the title character, Qin Shi Huang, in its world premiere.

description.zh-cn: 台湾台语流行音乐女歌手，曾于2002年与普拉西多·多明哥合唱。
description.en: Taiwanese Hokkien pop singer who performed a duet with Plácido Domingo in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 位于西班牙马德里的足球俱乐部，普拉西多·多明哥是其忠实支持者。
description.en: A football club based in Madrid, Spain, of which Plácido Domingo is a staunch supporter.

description.zh-cn: 因性骚扰指控而辞去总监职务。
description.en: Resigned from the position of General Director due to sexual harassment allegations.

relationships.source: 普拉西多·多明哥性骚扰指控

description.zh-cn: 性骚扰指控导致普拉西多·多明哥的多个演出被取消，并最终辞去洛杉矶歌剧院总监职务。
description.en: The sexual harassment allegations led to the cancellation of several of Plácido Domingo's performances and his eventual resignation as General Director of the Los Angeles Opera.

description.zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥在墨西哥确诊感染SARS-CoV-2病毒，并入院接受治疗。
description.en: Plácido Domingo tested positive for the SARS-CoV-2 virus in Mexico and was hospitalized for treatment.

description.zh-cn: 主修钢琴和指挥。
description.en: Majored in piano and conducting.

description.zh-cn: 在两年半的时间里，于280场演出中出演了12个角色。
description.en: Performed 12 roles in 280 performances over a period of two and a half years.

description.zh-cn: 普拉西多·多明哥家族的多位亲人在1985年墨西哥城大地震中罹难。
description.en: Several relatives of Plácido Domingo's family died in the 1985 Mexico City earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 作为“三大男高音”的成员共同举办演唱会。
description.en: Performed together as members of 'The Three Tenors'.

description.zh-cn: 作为“三大男高音”的成员共同举办演唱会。
description.en: Performed together as members of 'The Three Tenors'.

description.zh-cn: 首场三大男高音演唱会于1990年世界杯期间在罗马举行。
description.en: The first Three Tenors concert was held in Rome during the 1990 FIFA World Cup.

relationships.target: 卡雷拉斯国际血癌基金会

description.zh-cn: 首场演唱会的初衷是为卡雷拉斯国际血癌基金会筹款。
description.en: The initial purpose of the first concert was to raise funds for the José Carreras International Leukaemia Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 为歌剧《秦始皇》作曲。
description.en: Composed the opera 'The First Emperor'.

description.zh-cn: 在歌剧《秦始皇》的全球首演中担纲主唱，饰演秦始皇。
description.en: Starred as the lead, playing Qin Shi Huang, in the world premiere of the opera 'The First Emperor'.

description.zh-cn: 2002年11月在台湾演出时，邀请江蕙合唱歌曲《雨夜花》。
description.en: Invited Jody Chiang to sing a duet of the song 'Rainy Night Flower' during his performance in Taiwan in November 2002.

description.zh-cn: 是皇家马德里的铁杆粉丝，并为其演唱过队歌。
description.en: Is a staunch fan of Real Madrid and has sung the club's anthem.
